    • Constructor Detail

      • CustomRenderer

        public CustomRenderer(boolean contextual,
                      CartographerMain p,
                      Scale s,
                      boolean showPlayer,
                      MapCursor.Type defPointer,
                      int selectorDelay)
        Instantiates the CustomRenderer.
        Parameters:
        contextual - Whether this will be player specific.
        p - The Cartographer plugin.
        s - The scale of the map.
        showPlayer - Whether the viewer will show up or not.
        defPointer - The default Mapcursor.Type that the player will show up as
        selectorDelay - The default delay in seconds that the CursorSelectors will be re-picked from MapManager's cache of CursorSelectors.
